inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: BFLUTS questionnaire and Urgency Perception Scale

inclusion.criterion: Maximum flow rate of less than 15 ml/s on a volume voided of 200mls or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be able to give informed consent for the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of concurrent urodynamic stress incontinence
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient unfit or unwilling to undergo a general anaesthetic
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with bladder pathology or haematuria of unknown origin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with neurological disorders (as these may affect voiding)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Has severe bulbar urethral stricture requiring surgical fixation.
